aboutMePage.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: I'm a full-stack developer with experience in creating web and mobile applications, specialized in JavaScript environments with SQL/NoSQL database management. My focus is on delivering efficient, scalable, and high-quality solutions.
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: With experience working at startups like Desarrollamelo and GoBox, where I currently work, I've developed skills to work on both ends of the stack, developing integrated and highly functional applications.
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: My ability to quickly adapt to new technologies and environments allows me to tackle diverse and complex challenges, ensuring the implementation of innovative and efficient technological solutions.

id_1.title: GoBoxApp
id_1.description: Web application developed using the Apollo template in Angular with primeNG and Supabase as Backend, which has a large number of modules, such as managing quotes, clients, products, suppliers, activity calendar, etc.

id_2.title: Mr. Delivery
id_2.description: Mr. Delivery is a mobile platform for ordering food online. It allows users to explore menus from local restaurants, select products, and track the status of their orders in real time.

id_3.title: Tingo
id_3.description: Tingo Comercio is an application designed to simplify order management and inventory for businesses. It allows managing pending, preparation, and delivered orders, as well as enabling and editing products. It also offers advanced features such as order history and weekly and monthly profit statistics.

id_4.title: Protecting You
id_4.description: A parental control application that monitors the type of visual content consumed by the protected account using AWS rekognition service to detect inappropriate content. It also controls calls, location, contacts, and messages manageable from the web page. Both the mobile application and the backend are uploaded to GitHub.

id_5.title: Fast Food Store
id_5.description: A Progressive Web Application (PWA) accessible from any device, serving as the client-side of a delivery application. Users can add products to a cart, remove or continue adding, and see a total cost before proceeding to payment.

id_6.title: Collaborative Spreadsheet
id_6.description: A collaborative spreadsheet where multiple users can work simultaneously. To test sessions, you can open the project from another device or open more than one window with the same link, and the application will consider it as a new person.
